data.title: Bodo Möller Chemie
data.meta_description: Bodo Möller Chemie | ١٢٬٣٢٣ من المتابعين على LinkedIn. Engineer chemistry | Bodo Möller Chemie is one of the leading distributors of speciality chemical products and bonding solutions in Europe. With over 45 years of experience in this field our Core business areas are Adhesives & Sealants, Additives, Polymers and Coatings. With its headquarters in Germany (Offenbach) and subsidiaries in now 24 offices in Europe, Africa and Asia, a production plant in Egypt and a laboratory in Poland, the Bodo Möller Chemie Group has developed into a global operating company.
data.text:
New event with interactive concept: Bodo Möller Chemie offers a new seminar for the metal industry Bodo Möller Chemie is adding another event to its successful TechDialog seminar series: a specialist seminar on innovative surface technologies for the metal industry will be held in Heidelberg for the first time on 21st November 2024. With an interactive concept consisting of lectures and small group workshops, the TechDialog offers a varied platform for intensive exchange and practical training. Learn more: https://lnkd.in/eR6bUBeQ You want to register? Then click here: https://lnkd.in/exMATPgb #BodoMöllerChemie #Engineerchemistry #News #TechDialog #Seminar #SurfaceTechnologies

We are proud to be a sponsor of the impressive 15-year-old swimmer Rosa Reitz (SSKC Poseidon Aschaffenburg), who crossed Lake Constance / Bodensee twice on 03.08.2024 as part of the international Bodensee Open Water Events! Rosa completed the distance from Friedrichshafen to Romanshorn and back, a total of around 22 km, in an incredible 6:52 hours, making her the fastest of seven swimmers (5 men and 2 women). This achievement was made even more difficult by strong winds and challenging navigation conditions. Despite these challenges, Rosa shone and crossed the finish line in first place. An incredible achievement that only a few have reached, as most of the nearly 80 participants swam only half-way. The water quality was excellent with a pleasant temperature of 24°C, which provided optimal conditions for this great performance. Congratulations, Rosa! Bodo Möller Chemie congratulates you on this great success and wishes you all the best for your future swimming career. #BodoMöllerChemie #OpenWaterSwimming #Bodensee #Success #Sponsoring #Swimming #Congratulation

As of August 1st, we are happy to announce that Bodo Möller Chemie has been officially appointed as the Distributor for Huntsman Tooling Products across a broad range of countries. Our distribution territories now include: Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Denmark, Poland, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Romania, Bulgaria, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, North Macedonia, Montenegro, Serbia, Slovenia, Hungary, Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Jordan, Egypt, South Africa, India, Israel This expansion allows us to provide even more customers with high-quality Huntsman Tooling Products, backed by our exceptional service and technical expertise. We are excited to bring innovative solutions and reliable support to these new markets. Furthermore, we are the only supplier in Europe for UREOL® Tooling boards. We look forward to serving our customers in these regions and helping them achieve their goals with the best products in the industry. Find the expert for your region: https://lnkd.in/eFEBu8WA #BodoMöllerChemie #Huntsman #Ureol #ToolingProducts #Distribution #GlobalExpansion

What a fantastic event! This year's “Rad, Wein, Gesang 2024” annual bike race in Offenbach was an incredible success. Frank Haug, our Chairman of the Board, joined the race, embodying our commitment to the local community and passion for the sport. As a company headquartered in Offenbach, it’s a privilege to contribute to the “Rad, Wein, Gesang” race and see the enthusiasm and camaraderie it inspires. Congratulations to all participants and organizers for making this year’s event a huge success! We look forward to another great event in 2025 and continuing our support for this wonderful hometown event. From left to right: Jürgen Bamberger, Chief organizer, Rad, Wein, Gesang Frank Haug, Chairman of the Board, Bodo Möller Chemie Group #BodoMöllerChemie #Engineerchemistry #RadWeinGesang2024 #Offenbach

Wax additives play a crucial role in achieving specific surface effects and enhancing the overall appearance, scratch & abrasion resistance, durability, haptics, and surface smoothness. Our Lanco and Aquaslip series are used in a variety of applications such as plastic compounding, leather & wood care products and polishes, adhesives, lubricants, building materials, automotive, and much more. Lubrizol surface modifiers are available in a wide range, including carnauba, amide, and polyolefin waxes and are offered as emulsion, dispersion, and micronized solutions for various purposes. Selecting the right wax additive is pivotal to meeting the performance requirements of your industry. Don´t hesitate to ask our experts for the perfect wax additive for your specific needs. Find the expert for your region: https://lnkd.in/eFEBu8WA #BodoMöllerChemie #EngineerChemistry #Lubrizol #Waxadditives

We are excited to welcome Yoon Yoonsuk Yang as Managing Director of Bodo Möller Chemie Korea. Yoon's expertise based on the experience in various chemical and plastic industries will lead Bodo Möller Chemie's global presence and expansion by providing differentiated solutions in many industries in Korea. Previously, Yoon has worked at Henkel, focusing on the appliance and thermal management sectors, at Avient in the packaging and textile markets, as well as at LG Chem in the Polyolefin division. Welcome to Bodo Möller Chemie, Yoon Yang! We look forward to seeing the growth in Korea. #BodoMöllerChemie #Engineerchemistry #Korea #Expansion

We are delighted to announce the recent arrival of Julian Bashore as Managing Director of Bodo Möller Chemie Japan. A graduate of the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania, he launched his career in specialty chemicals in 1995. Working for multinationals such as PPG and MacDermid, Julian’s commercial experience and track record of both market entry and market expansion in Japan will complement Bodo Möller Chemie’s global expertise in delivering solutions to customers in industries such as automotive and electronics. Welcome to Bodo Möller Chemie, Julian Bashore! We are excited for what lies ahead as we plan to enter the Japanese market. #BodoMöllerChemie #Engineerchemistry #Japan #Expansion

Celebrating 50 Years of Partnership: Bodo Möller Chemie and BASF We are pleased to celebrate our 50th anniversary of our partnership with BASF! Since 1973, we have been working closely together, initially starting with packaging and distributing of Irganox® plastic additives to small and medium-sized customers. Throughout the years, our partnership has grown as we expanded our distribution to include a wider range of products from the BASF portfolio. Today, we offer a diverse selection of high-quality additives for plastics and coatings. These include antioxidants, light stabilizers, and UV absorbers under the brand names Irganox®, Tinuvin®, and Chimassorb®. These plastic stabilizers, which were introduced in the 1970s, have since developed into innovative market solutions that have significantly improved the performance and promoted the sustainability of plastic applications. For decades, we have been accompanying BASF products and greatly valued our trusted and successful collaboration. Together, we look forward to a promising future filled with continuous success and many years of partnership! Left picture, from left to right: Francisco Rives, Head of Plastics Industry Europe, BTC Europe Norbert Lorenz, Sales Manager Performance Chemicals, Bodo Möller Chemie Gerhard Schlosser, Advisor to the Board, Bodo Möller Chemie Korinna Möller-Boxberger, Managing Director, Bodo Möller Chemie Frank Haug, Chairman of the Board, Bodo Möller Chemie Ricard Vandellos, Vice President Plastic Additive EMEA, BASF #BodoMöllerChemie #Partnership #Anniversary #SuccessStories #BASF #PlasticAdditives #StrongerTogether #Innovation #Future
